messages.subject: The Isle of Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh Welcome Michele. Glad to have you here on our little unschooling island. May I offer you a lovely Pina Colada? ;-) ... Unschooling offers such freedom
messages.messageBody:
>>I am new and have never posted before. I feel like I have sailed a rough
>>sea and finally found dry land - and that is a modest way of saying
>>it!:)>>

Oh Welcome Michele. Glad to have you here on our little unschooling island.
May I offer you a lovely Pina Colada? ;-)

>>I am SO happy to have finally found exactly what I have been looking
>>for.>>

Unschooling offers such freedom for both you and your children. Living and
learning, the perfect combination.

>>If it weren't for my youngest son yelling and screaming and telling me
>>about his nightmares about going back to school - he's 11 - I
wouldn't have bothered to investigate homeschooling again.>>

It's amazing how our kids will find a way to let us know what they really
need. Hurray for your son! And hurray for you for listening.

Life is good.
~Mary
